# scam.ink — Tattoo & Ink Scam Database

> Community-powered database of tattoo & ink scams. Search, vote, report, and protect yourself. Exposing fraud in the tattoo & ink industry.


scam.ink is a community-driven scam exposure platform focused on the tattoo & ink industry. Features a searchable database of known scams with risk levels, community voting, reporting tools, and educational resources. Users can search scams, vote on severity, share warnings on social media, and report new scams.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Tattoo & Ink scam database and community reports](https://scam.ink)


## Keywords

tattoo & ink scams, scam database, fraud alert, scam warning, scam.ink
